description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Early Childhood Education provides pre-kindergarten and transitional kindergarten programs for children aged 3 to 5. Curriculum includes instruction in early literacy, math, science, art, physical development, and social/emotional development. Programs are subsidized based on family income level.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
